description: Listed Building Consent for retaining the river boundary wall in its existing position amendment to approved application 01076/56/L2 dated 04/09/2020 for the demolition and replacement of outbuildings with single storey side extension, basement extension, replacement of windows, other associated refurbishment works, internal and external alterations. (Basement rooflight in raised flowerbed and changes to side extension glazed doors and screen of planting).
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - No development (except any demolition, site clearance, ground investigation and remediation work) shall take place until samples of the bricks and tiles/materials etc.] to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. 

The samples/details shall include: 
(a) window treatments/details (including sections and reveals);

The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
01076/56/P5
Current application for Variation of Condition 2 (approved plans) and Condition 7 (The proposed development shall be carried out in accordance with submitted Flood Risk Assessment ref GWPR3242/FRA/October 2019 version V2.03 prepared by Ground and Water Limited) to allow leaving the river boundary wall as existing.

01076/56/P3
Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) to allow a basement roof window in raised flowerbed and changes to side extension glazed doors and screen of planning application 01076/56/P2 approved 19/12/2019 for the demolition and replacement of outbuildings with single storey side extension, basement extension, replacement of windows, other associated refurbishment works, internal and external alterations
Approved 04/09/2020
